name: Ski Slope Simulator
description:
Ever played a skiing or snowboarding game where you're in charge of that stupid human sliding around? In Slope Simulator you get a 100% AUTHENTIC experience of playing as the MOUNTAIN! Draw the slope as you go! Force that stupid snowboarder to jump when it pleases you!

Land flips for AWESOME POINTS! MULTIPLIERS! COINS! AAA! ROCKS!
